      • separateArgs

        private java.lang.String[] separateArgs(java.lang.String[] inputArray,
                                        int truncate)
        Takes an inputArray of strings, and truncates it to length truncate, taking all leftover elements of the array and combining it into the last element of the truncated one. Ex: separateArgs(new String[]{"Hi", "Hello", " World"}, 2) = {"Hi", "Hello World"}
        Parameters:
        inputArray - The array to be concatenated
        truncate - The length of the final array
        Returns:
        A truncated String[] array, with all elements after truncate combined into the last element.

      • permissionMessage

        private void permissionMessage(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender)
        Sends a permission denied message
        Parameters:
        sender - Represents where to send the message.
